column.name: SBWJZSFCZWPLSJ
column.describe: 申报文件中是否存在未披露数据

column.name: SFSJGQZQRZ
column.describe: 是否涉及股权、债权融资

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

column.name: XMZSFHFZKZYYJ
column.describe: 项目组是否回复质控专员意见

column.name: XMZHFZKZYYJ
column.describe: 项目组回复质控专员意见

column.name: XMZHFZKBSHYJ
column.describe: 项目组回复质控部审核意见

column.name: ZKBECSHYJHF
column.describe: 项目组回复二次审核意见

column.name: ZBSCBXXXBGYJ
column.describe: 资本市场部适销性报告意见

column.name: ZBSCBXXXSHYJ
column.describe: 资本市场部适销性审核意见

column.name: XMZHFZBBSHYJ
column.describe: 项目组回复资本部审核意见

column.name: SCLXHYYJHZ
column.describe: 上传立项会议意见汇总

column.name: SFHB
column.comment: '<font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>'

column.name: LXBJYJ
column.option: 1|同意;3|有条件同意;4|暂缓;2|不同意

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: SFWCLYCTJC
column.describe: 是否完成利益冲突核查

column.name: LXFS
column.option: 1|线上立项表决;2|线下立项表决

restrictions.condition:
{"statement":"(lcIB_LXSP.XMLX = {0} OR {0} IS NULL)
AND (lcIB_LXSP.SQBM ={1} OR {1} IS NULL)
AND (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(lcIB_LXSP.SQSJ,'YYYYMMDD')) >= {2} OR {2} IS NULL)
AND (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(lcIB_LXSP.SQSJ,'YYYYMMDD')) <= {3} OR {3} IS NULL)","args":[{"expression":"parameter.XMLX","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.FQBM","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.RQQJ","scale":0,"length":0,"type":13},{"expression":"parameter.RQQJ_JS","scale":0,"length":0,"type":13}],"type":0}

command.describe: 上传全套立项材料扫描版
